name: Adni
long_description:
Adni is the first super app for healthcare workers. With Adni, healthcare workers can trade advice anonymously, find jobs, buy gear, review education, store credentials, earn rewards, and more.

Leading healthcare organizations, such as UT Medical Center, Fusion Medical Staffing, and PRN Healthcare, partner with Adni to recruit, reward, and retain top-quality healthcare talent through our professional network and white-labeled talent experience software.
